channel.title: pluralsight on kolislab
channel.description: Recent content in pluralsight on kolislab

item.title: Learn Offline (during travel)
item.description: If you want to get the most out of your time during travelling, on a train, on an airplane or just on public transportation - if you live in a city where this is an option - I suggest the use Pluralsight’s desktop and mobile clients for the experience of offline usage. You can find the applications download links here https://www.pluralsight.com/downloads

item.title: 3 months free Pluralsight
item.description: Pluralsight benefits As you might all know. Microsoft has a program to help the developers to kick-start their Cloud journey. This program is called Visual Studio Dev Essentials. With this program you can have access to some really useful resources. Let me give you some examples: Free Azure account + $200 for the first month Access to couple of free Azure services 3 months of free access to Pluralsight MSDN magazine - Digital edition 3 months of LinkedIn Learning access for free It’s highly encouraged to register and activate these learning benefits.
